body: If this seemingly unremarkable utensil is placed in an empty container, the vessel fills with a thick, pasty gruel. Although the gruel tastes like warm, wet cardboard, it is highly nourishing and contains everything necessary to sustain any herbivorous, omnivorous, or carnivorous creature. The spoon can produce sufficient gruel each day to feed up to four humans.
name: Sustaining Spoon
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Slotless/Slotless Wondrous Items/Sustaining Spoon
